column1: way down the leg side to start off, full on leg stump, and going past Khawaja's pads
much better line, on a good length outside off stump, the new ball angles shapes further away from Khawaja, he shoulders his arms
good length on middle stump, but once again going down the leg side as Khawaja attempts a pull. More extras
beautiful shape! Full outside off, and shaping away from Khawaja as he tries to drive to cover. Flies just past his outside edge.
misses the pull now! Too full to play that shot as the ball slides between Khawaja's bat and pad. Full ball outside off that he tried to send towards deep midwicket
good length wide outside off, tapped off the front foot to cover point. Still no runs off the bat
full outside off, and cripsly driven down the ground, another dot to mid off.
back of a length outside off, and it takes off from the pitch! Extra bounce, that Khawaja plays all around. Gives it a wild slash off the back foot but makes no contact with the bat
back of a length outside off, worked off the back foot towards midwicket with soft hands, quick to get off the mark
back of a length outside off, Khawaja tries to pull but under edges it. Trickles down to short fine leg, who is charging in
overpitched full outside off, forces Khawaja to reach at it. Tries to drive square but the ball seams away slightly. MIsses once again
full outside off, chopped off the back foot towards point, and he's off the mark too. Took him nine balls
there's the first maximum! Short on off stump, comes charging down the ground and attempts a hook, takes the top edge and over the deep backward square boundary
full on off stump, driven firmly to cover, and they're off for a dangerous single. Great throw from Botha, but misses the stumps. He had only one stump to aim at, to be fair. Vince was in trouble
good length on middle and off, Vince tries to cut but too close to his body, inside edged onto his pads. Trickles away just past his leg stump. Lucky once again
pushed full way outside off, but Vince walks across to the off side, and lifts this over extra cover. Just about enough elevation to beat the man inside the circle
back of a length outside off, angling further away from the batsman, tries to slash hard at it, but misses. Extra pace, and definitely some extra bounce off the surface
full on middle and that's slogged cross-batted towards deep midwicket, only fetch him a single

top edge, but just short of first slip! Quick ball short outside off, Khawaja looked like he was ready for that delivery, but couldn't execute the pull. Takes the top edge off the bat's shoulder, but doesn't carry

Zips off the surface, and over the keeper! Short on off stump and Khawaja lets it go, but the ball has really picked up after bouncing and flies over Nevill's outstretched hands. The keeper jumped high too, but doesn't matter here at the SCG. Goes down as byes
full outside off, charges down the ground and mistimes to midwicket
full once again, but pushed slightly wider, just about enough width for the batsman as he comes charging down the ground, smacked over wide long off
Vince backs away, but Lyon follows! Good length on middle stump and turning further into the batsman as he goes towards the leg side, misses the shot completely
good length wide outside off, Vince walks across to the off side and tries to sweep, but the ball hits his pads instead. But played outside the line of the stumps, so safe from the lbw
full just outside off, attempts a sweep, but straight to midwicket
that's a biggie! Full on off stump, and that's lifted over Lyon's head. Off the bat's sweet spot,and lands in the crowd beyond the long-on boundary. Huge hit.
full on middle and leg, Vince flicks this loose ball off his pads very fine, beats short fine leg, and fetches the Englishman a boundary

full outside off, and Vince dances down the ground once more. Slogged towards cow corner, but doesn't have the distance. Falls safe, between three men in front of cow corner. Stopped by Dwarsuis there
back of a length just outside off, chopped off the back foot to point, hit with soft hands and allows them to race through for the single
good length on middle stump, slightly extra bounce on this occasion and Khawaja attempts to bat. Comes off the bat's top half and the ball lands just short of mid off
good length on leg stump, Khawaja backs away and tries to punch off the back foot, inside edge ricochets onto his pads, but the ball trickles away towards the off side

full outside off, Vince walks across to get inside the line of the ball, but can't flick it square. Hits the outside off his front leg instead. Abbott considers appealing but knows impact was outside off stump
full on middle and leg, misses the clip off his toes, crashes into his front leg, but impact was outside leg

there's the dab from Brathwaite! Full on middle stump, he goes deep into the crease and tries to work this towards the leg side, misses and this time impact on his pads is in front of middle stump. Big appeal from the West Indian, and the umpire gives Uzi the slow finger of death
back of a length outside off, tries to pull but the outside edge takes it down to third man
slower ball yorker on off stump, squeezes it down well past point, races down to the third man boundary. Unlucky for Brathwaite to leak four runs off such a peach of a delivery
back of a length outside off, angling into Vince as he misses the nudge off his pads, hits his pads but too high
full on middle stump, tapped down the ground to Maddinson at long on
back of a length outside off, tapped with soft hands towards point, they're off for a quick single, and Silk 's diving direct hit is just a bit too slow. Watson's diving effort saves him
back of a length on middle stump, tapped from near his chest down to square leg, played with soft hands towards the leg side
back of a length outside off, cut off the back foot to third man, a couple for the batsmen to run through
back of a length outside off, shapes a bit away from Watson, pokes at it outside off and taps it to point
pulls, but plays on! Back of a length outside off, tries to pull this behind square after swiveling but the ball takes a bottom edge and crashes into middle stump. That's a big wicket
full and wide outside off, slashed uppishly just over gully. Streaky shot, but hit over the infield. Goes down to wide third man
back of a length outside off, gets inside the line of the ball and punches back to Lyon
good length outside off, cut off the back foot past the man at cover point. There's protection in the deep, though
tossed up full outside off, comes down the ground and taps it down to Maddinson at long on. They walk through for the single
good length wide outside off, spins into Ferguson as he nudges it to short midwicket
full outside off, and he's down on one knee. Pulled well, but not in the gap. Straight to deep backward square
Nevill misses the stumping! Full outside off and Vince yorks himself by charging down the ground, but Nevill is blinded by Vince's bat, and can't collect the ball. Another reprieve for Vince.
good length on middle stump, spins into Ferguson, misses the flick off his hips
back of a length on middle stump, tapped off his pads towards cow corner
full on off stump, and once again Vince yorks himself by coming down the wicket. Dug back to Botha
just over short cover! Good length outside off, and Vince backs away towards the leg side. Punched over the man at cover, but out of the fielder's reach
full outside off, driven down the ground to long off on this occasion
ripper outside off, spins into Ferguson as he taps it to deep midwicket off the front foot
good length wide outside off, enough room to free his arms. Cut away to deep point
tossed up outside off, and it's hit powerfully down the ground, but not off the middle of the bat. Down long on's throat
back of a length outside off, walks down the ground but cramps himself with the ball turning into him, tapped to midwicket
full outside off, worked off the front foot towards the leg side, but straight to the man at midwicket
full outside off, and he's down on one knee to sweep. Pinged to deep backward square
tossed up full outside off, and he tries to lift this over the bowler. Takes a leading edge, and it lobs down to long off
can't put the full toss away. Waist-high ball on off stump, but bunted down the ground to mid off
back of a length outside off, tries to punch it towards cover, but takes the outside edge past the keeper's right! Down to third man
back of a length outside off, tapped off the back foot past the bowler, but only up to Mid off
another breakthrough! Good length but wide outside off, Ferguson goes chasing at it, and slashes it uppishly over point, but taken easily by Denly at deep backward point
back of a length outside off once more, carved off the back foot past point's right
slower ball but short on middle stump, tapped off the back foot to short fine leg
full ball darted into off stump, driven down the ground to long on
full on off stump, big stride forward and whipped off his toes to deep backward square
tossed up full on middle stump, hit to short midwicket, and Lyon hurts his jaw trying to field it
full ball outside off, opens the bat's face and glances it fine past short third man. Chase for the fielder, allows them to take the second
full outside off, tapped down the ground to the man at long on
full and wide outside off, carved off the back foot to deep backward point. Well stopped by Carlos Brathwaite near the boundary
slower ball to start the over, on a good length and Green's through his pull too early. Hits his gut, but allows them to take the leg bye anyway
full outside off, firmly hit down the ground to mid off for a quick run
low full toss on off stump, and that's smacked back to the bowler. Crashes into Henriques' left ankle on the full, but falls away thereafter. Goes down as a dropped chance
back of a length outside off, tries to carve off the back foot, thick outside edge down to third man
good length just outside off stump, and Green tries to clear his arms. But too close to his body for the off-side carve over point. Misses it completely
top edged over the keeper's head! Short on middle, and he tries to pull this, but takes the edge over Nevill's outstretched hands. Third man can't cut it off either
back of a length outside off, walks across to the off side and nudges it away towards cow corner
back of a length outside off, through his drive shot too early, comes off the top of the bat and falls just short of Lyon
ful outside off and Nair shimmies down the ground, driven to cover for a quick single
full outside off, and Green tries to reverse sweep! Not hit well enough, but good enough for them to steal the single
Nair tries to reverse sweep as well, but can't. The full ball outside off spins into his body and hits him near his helmet
full outside off, and it's extravagantly swept away over square leg. Work for the man at fine leg
good length but wide outside off, too wide thinks the umpire as the batsman misses his cut shot
full outside off, and it's smashed into the off side. Off the bottom of the bat, but Denly is slow to react from deep extra cover. Just short of Denly
back of a length outside off, stays deep in his crease and punches this square behind point
short and wide outside off, attempted pull but from outside off. Got enough muscle behind that shot, though. Beats Jordan Silk at the long-on boundary
short and wide outside off, carved inside out over cover. Once again hit into the vacant area in front of Denly at deep extra cover
back of a length outside off, slower ball this time. Cut off the back foot to point
back of a length outside off, backs away and carves it to deep point
yorker just outside off, well dug out by Nair, they scamper through for the single
full on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long on
back of a length outside off, pulled along the carpet to midwicket. Not timed well
good length on middle stump, drags his pull down to deep backward square for a single
low full toss outside off, tapped to cover but no run on offer

back of a length outside off, muscled to deep midwicket off the back foot, but played gently enough for them to take the second. Good throw in, but Nevill fails to collect the incoming through. They complete two runs
back of a length outside off, angling into Green but he misses his cross-batted slog. Through to the keeper
full outside off, and in the arc for Green to hit through. Lifted over the bowler's head, and lands just short of the long-off boundary. Two bounces into the boundary ropes
low full toss outside off, hit firmly to cover but can't find the gap
overpitched outside off, but just over the tram lines outside off

full on middle stump, and that's hit to long on! Silk gets under the ball, but steps on the ropes as he completes the catch. A look of disappointment from the fielder as he admits that his stepped on the boundary. Good sportsmanship
full and wide outside off once again, another run that goes down as extras
full and wide outside off, tries to slog this over the leg side but takes the outside edge over the keeper's right, work for third man in the deep
full outside off, and another wild slash at it over the infield, it's in the air, but falls beyond cover point
This time Silk takes the catch! Short on middle stump, and Nair tries to pull this into the stands. Not hit well enough, and good effort from the fielding running in. Nair goes
good length outside off, and that's been creamed over cow corner! Uses all the muscle he has to slog this over  the leg side. Taken well be a fan in the crowd

good length on middle stump, tapped off the back foot to midwicket. They want the quick single, and get it despite the direct hit at the non-striker's. Green now wants the second run, but the ball is very close to the bowler. He throws it at the keeper and Green is stranded. Falls for 49, trying to get to 50.
short on middle stump, angling away from the left hander, chopped down to third man
good length outside off, angling further away, misses the back-foot cut
full on off stump, and that's crunched through the cover region. Still head, and nice follow through of the bat. Threads the gap between mid off and cover
full on off stump, nudged off the back foot to square leg, early call for the single
tossed up full on leg stump, tries to push at it with hard hands, misses the shot as the ball crashes into his front pad, allows them to steal a run, though
full on off stump, tapped firmly to cover for a quick single
good length on middle, and it's punched over cover off the back foot. Just about enough behind that shot to beat Henriques at cover
full outside leg and spinning into his pads, misses the flick towards the leg side
good length on leg stump, and Lenton backs away to get clear his arms. Smacked over Botha's head, and falls just beyond the man at the long-on boundary. Useful six to end the 19th
full and wide outside off, stays just inside the tram lines. Brilliant length
overpitched full outside off once again, and this time it's just inside the tram lines once more. Rohrer tries to carve this behind square, but fails to get any connection
yorker on off stump this time, tapped down the ground to wide mid on
full outside off, but slashed hard by Lenton. Slices it, and the ball flies over short third man. The fielder loses the chase
full on middle stump, and smacked over Brathwaite's head. Beats mid off, and there's no stopping that once it goes past Maddinson
low full toss outside off, carved over point to the man at the deep. Sydney Thunder finish at 6 for 156
full on middle stump, and finds the outside edge straightaway. Drives straight down the wrong line, but the edge flies past the diving first-slip fielder, races away to the third-man boundary

full on off stump and comes into the right hander, misses the defense, as the ball crashes into his pads, and goes through between the keeper and first slip. Big, big appeal for lbw but too high thinks the umpire.
good length outside off, and beaten! Goes back to carve behind square but misses the shot completely
full on middle stump, shapes into the left hander, defended back to Sandhu
full outside off, and crunched off the front foot on this occasion. Fins the gap through the covers, and that's another boundary
back of a length on off stump, forces the batsman to go deep into his crease. Defended off the back foot
full on off stump, driven firmly off the front foot. Straight to cover
good length on middle stump, chopped off the back foot to point
good length on middle stump, punched off the back foot, but straight to the man at cover. Tight line from McClenaghan for the first half of the over

and the change of angle works better for the batting team! Full on off stump, and flicked off his toes with ease. Flies over deep midwicket and it lands just inside the rope. The umpires wanna have a second look... nope, it hit the ropes on the full! A maximum!
good length on middle stump, defended off the back foot, and takes the bottom edge. Denly's lucky that did not roll onto his stumps

short on middle stump and Denly comes charging down the wicket to pull. Misses the shot altogether as the ball soars over his shoulder and through to the keeper. He wants the wide from the square-leg umpire, but there's no such call
full outside off, hit off the back foot with the bat's open face, diving effort from the man at point to keep it down to a single
full on leg stump, tapped off his toes brilliantly behind square, chase for Khawaja in the deep but his dive near the ropes are not good enough. Can't parry it back

big appeal for lbw, but turned down again! Slower ball on a good length on off stump, deceived by the pace as he tries to work it towards the leg side. Hit him on leg stump, would've gone down the leg side

back of a length outside off, and it's pulled in front of square! Off the middle of the bat, and the ball soars into the cow corner boundary! Disappointment from the men in thestands, as they drop the crowd catch.
full on leg stump, swings further down the leg side. Goes down as an extra
back of a length outside off, worked off the back foot to midwicket
good length outside off, and he's quick to get into position. Pulled perfectly over deep midwicket, as the ball flies over Uzi and into the Sixers dugout. Oof, terrific shot.
full on off stump, muscled away to point with the bat's open face
full on off stump, turned off his pads to square leg off the front foot
tossed up full on middle stump, tries to drive but takes the outside of the bat. Leading edge to mid off instead
tossed up on middle stump, Denly shimmies down the wicket and converts it into a full toss. Muscled off his hips to deep midwicket
back of a length on off stump, rocks back and tries to cut square but can't find the direction. Straight to the man at point
tossed up outside off, tucked into the leg side for a couple more, chase for the bowler with no mid-on present there
overpitched full outside off, but it's been drilled off the front foot past Rohrer at backward point. Misfield from the fielder, as he fails to stop the ball. Allows the ball to race away for four
beautiful shape from the bowler, good length on middle stump and angling across the right-hander's body. Tries to punch off the back foot, but plays inside the line of the ball
full on middle stump, driven off the front foot, mistimed towards backward point
full on middle stump, clipped off his pads to deep midwicket, but only a single
full outside off, punched firmly down the ground to James Vince at mid off
full outside off, slower ball to end the over. Driven straight to cover
full on off stump, hit past Watson to Vince at mid off. They're taking his arm on for the single, completed with ease
full on middle stump, worked off his toes to cow corner. Khawaja the man in the deep

short and wide outside off, comes down the ground and attempts to pull. Comes off the bottom of the bat, and Vince (from mid off) races back to complete the catch, but fluffs it after lunging at it running away. Dropped!
full and wide outside off, enough room to free his arms. Driven square to the man in the deep
offcutter on leg stump, clipped comfortably off his pads to the man in the deep on the leg side
back of a length outside off, and it's slashed uppishly over point. No one in the deep there, and the ball crashes into the boundary ropes. Ends the Powerplay with a four
full on middle stump, driven away from his body to cover
tossed up full outside off, driven back down the ground to Fawad
tossed up full on off stump, worked off his toes to short fine leg
back of a length on off stump, turned off his pads to midwicket for a single
good length on middle stump, punched off the back foot to long off
full outside off, tapped down the ground to long off
full on middle and leg, backs away and muscles down the ground to long on
tossed up full outside leg, nudged off his boots to deep midwicket
full outside off, spins a bit away from the right-hander, pushed to cover
good length on leg stump, backs away and punches off the back foot past cover, allows them to take the second
back of a length on leg stump, worked off his pads past square leg. They want the two, but not on this occasion. Happy to rotate the strike off the spinners
full outside off, charges down the wicket, and tries to drive inside out, but inside edge ricochets onto his pads. Ends the over with a dot
full and wide outside off, tries to reach at it by driving away from his body, but no connection. Sharply taken by the keeper
short on middle stump, comfortably pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket
full on middle stump, Denly quick to get down on one knee and swats it away to the deep on the leg side
big appeal! But turned down. Full on leg stump, and Hughes tried to sweep it away. Misses the shot, and the call for lbw seemed very tight. Fawad will feel unlucky
full on off stump, dug away to short cover, Fawad gives it a chase as the batsmen scamper through

the wrong'un gets him the wicket! Full outside off, enticing the batsman to come down the ground, it's the offspinner from the back of the hand, and the ball zips through between bat and pad. Takes the top of off stump, and Denly has to go
tossed up on middle stump, spinning away from the left hander, carved off the back foot past cover
full on leg stump, tapped off the front foot to midwicket. No chance of a single
full on off stump, driven down the ground to Vince at long on
good length on leg stump, backs away and carves this past point
full on leg stump, driven down the ground but well stopped by Nair diving to his left
back of a length on middle stump, cut square off the back foot. Work for Sandhu in the deep, but his drilled throw can't stop the second
full outside off, driven off the front foot to deep extra cover. Hit firmly
back of a length outside off, tries to cut square but plays under the ball. Sharp take from the keeper
good length on middle stump, misses the cut shot once again
overpitched on leg stump, clipped off his pads to short fine leg. Loose ball, but Maddinson can't put it away
full on middle and off, big stride forward and hit down the ground to wide long off
full on middle stump, clipped down the ground to long on
tossed up full on off stump, swept furiously to deep backward square
full outside off, and driven down the ground, flies just past the non striker, and through to long off
full on middle, and that's punished! Over cow corner! Down on one knee and swung hard at that loopy ball. Dispatched
full outside off, tapped down the ground to wide long off
tossed up full outside off, driven hard, but straight to extra cover
good length on middle stump, turns away from the left-hander, backs away and cuts to point
full outside off, and sliced away over point, great diving effort from McClenaghan in the deep to parry the ball back
tossed up full on middle stump, Maddinson walks down the pitch and taps it past midwicket
good length on middle stump, tries to pull but misses. Hits his front pad, but outside leg. Soft appeal for lbw
good length on leg stump, check-lifts it over the bowler's head. Falls short of Green at long on
full outside off stump, crunched past cover, beats Vince at wide long off. First boundary in over 30 balls for Hughes
full on leg stump, tapped down the ground to long on. Fawad finishes with 1 for 22
back of a length on middle stump, swivels and pulls along the carpet to deep backward square. No one in the deep there, and that's four useful runs
short and wide outside off, slapped over point off the back foot. Well struck, and comfortably played by standing tall
cuts him in half! Good length outside off, but stays low this time. Zips through between bat and pad and through to the keeper
slower ball overpitched outside off, driven off the front foot with the bat's open face, played to deep backward point
yorker on middle stump, tapped off his boots in front of midwicket. Early call for the single
good length outside off, tapped with soft hands down the ground to long on
full on middle and leg, comes down the ground and taps this past the bowler to long off
back of a length on middle stump, punched off the back foot towards the non-striker, but a diving stop from Green keeps it down to a dot
Maddinson backs away and Green follows him. Drilled full on leg stump, and the batsman can only defend this back to Green
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover
full on middle stump, crunched off the front foot to McClenaghan in the deep on the off side
tossed up on leg stump, tries to work it off his pads but misses. He's out of his ground, but the keeper is too slow to collect the stray ball and attempt to stump him out
good length on leg stump, and it's whipped easily off his pads! Flies over the vacant fine-leg boundary for a maximum. There's his fifty
full outside off, angles away from him, wild swing from the batsman as he plays all around it
full and wide outside off, crisply driven away from his body to the man in the deep behind square
short on leg stump, but Maddinson's up to the challenge. Pulled, and top edges it over fine leg once again. Enough behind that shot to take it over the ropes
full outside off, and driven firmly to Rohrer at wide long off. Enough time to come back for the second
full on middle stump, smacked down the ground to long off. Maddinson will keep strike
full outside off, wild slash at it, takes the top edge. Terrific catch from Rohrer at short third man. Had to run backwards to take the catch.
back of a length on off stump, spins further away as he tries to pull. Bottom edges it to square leg
back of a length outside off, sharp spin into the right hander, backs away and chops on to first slip
full outside off, big wind up from the batsman, and the drive takes an outside edge. Flies just past first slip, and there's work to do for Fawad from short third man
full outside off, stays still and cuts late past first slip. Intercepted by short third man
full on middle stump, clipped off his pads to Chris Green at wide long on. Great effort from the fielder to stop them from taking the extra run
full outside off, swept square to deep midwicket. Hit well, but straight to the fielder
thick outside edge! Good length on off stump, Moises backs away and looks to drive inside out, but takes the outside edge. Work for short third man once more
tossed up full on off stump, hit firmly to cover. Calls early for the single
tossed up full and wide outside off, Hughes comes down the ground but mistimes his drive to long off
full on middle stump, low yorker bunted back to the bowler. Lots of movement from Henriques before Green bowled, but the bowler kept his composure
Henriques backs away, and Green follows him. Low full toss outside leg stump, bunted away to mid off. Terrific over from Green
full outside off, and it's in Mo's arc! Stays still and slogs this over cover. Wide long off can't intercept
full toss wide outside off, slapped behind to the man at short third man
slower ball full outside off, drags his pull along the ground to deep backward square
back of a length on middle stump, pulled powerfully to Sandhu in the deep. They're not gonna take his arm on for the second

slower ball outside off, and it's been pulled over midwicket. Not timed well at all because of the slower ball (106 kph), lands inside the circle. They want the second, but Hughes slips while turning. Only a single.

full toss on off stump, lifted to long on for a single. They want the second, though, and Hughes may be in trouble! Vince thorws in flat, and McClenaghan is positioned near the stumps, but Hughes' diving effort saves him. Sixers need nine to win off the final over.
full toss outside off, muscled over the non-striker's head to long on
full and wide outside off, spins further away, cut to deep point, and Hughes manages to turn back for another second.
yorker on off stump, dug away to mid off. They scamper through for the run as Green misfields chasing the ball

low full toss on leg stump, clipped off his pads to midwicket. He wants the single, and done easily despite Green breaking the stumps. Terrific call from the umpire, chooses not even to go to the third umpire. Three needed off two now.
yorker outside off, dug away to cover. One for a super over, two for the win!

full outside off, muscled square past midwicket to wide long off, Sandhu is sluggish in the deep, and that allows them to come back for the second. Sixers win by eight wickets, their first win of the season!
